subject: Attention Beneficiary:
body:
Attn: beneficiary.

In line with arrangement we have for your funds release.

I have discussed with the management of Türkiye Ergul-Bankasi Talatspasah
ağı Istanbul and we have reached agreement for your funds release Process.

You should get in touch with Kirk Cottrell.

Mr Kirk Cottrell is the director in charge of remittances at Türkiye
Ergul-Bankasi Talatspasah ağı Istanbul.

Reach him through  Email:  kirk.cottrell@dr.com


Contact Tel: +90 534 359 52 22

Mr Kirk Cottrell   will give you directives on what to do in order to
access the funds.

Copy me what you receive from him for my directive.

Sincerely yours
Barr. Ofiaja Johnson.
